actions.name: AssignAdminPermissionsToUser
actions.description: Grants permission to add AWS Supply Chain administrator permission to federated user

actions.name: CreateBillOfMaterialsImportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create a BillOfMaterialsImportJob which will import a CSV file of BillOfMaterials records

actions.name: CreateDataIntegrationFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to create DataIntegrationFlow that can transform from multiple sources to one target

actions.name: CreateDataLakeDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to create the data lake dataset

actions.name: CreateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: CreateSSOApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create IAM Identity Center application for a AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: DeleteDataIntegrationFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the DataIntegrationFlow

actions.name: DeleteDataLakeDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the data lake dataset

actions.name: DeleteInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: DeleteSSOApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to delete IAM Identity Center application of the AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: DescribeInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of an AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: GetBillOfMaterialsImportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to view status and details of a BillOfMaterialsImportJob

actions.name: GetDataIntegrationFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to get the DataIntegrationFlow details

actions.name: GetDataLakeDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to get the dataset details

actions.name: GetInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to view details of an AWS Supply Chain instance

actions.name: ListAdminUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Supply Chain administrators of an instance

actions.name: ListDataIntegrationFlows
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the DataIntegrationFlows in a paginated way

actions.name: ListDataLakeDatasets
actions.description: Grants permission to list the data lake datasets under specific instance and namespace

actions.name: ListInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to view the AWS Supply Chain instances associated with an AWS account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS Supply Chain resource

actions.name: RemoveAdminPermissionsForUser
actions.description: Grants permission to remove AWS Supply Chain administrator permission from federated user

actions.name: SendDataIntegrationEvent
actions.description: Grants permission to create a DataIntegrationEvent which will ingest data in real-time

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS Supply Chain resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tag from an AWS Supply Chain resource

actions.name: UpdateDataIntegrationFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to update the DataIntegrationFlow

actions.name: UpdateDataLakeDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to update the data lake dataset

actions.name: UpdateInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Supply Chain instance
